faqs.question: Is pest control safe for pets and children?
faqs.answer: Yes, many providers offer pet- and child-safe treatment options using approved, low-toxicity chemicals. You can request these specifically when booking.

faqs.question: How long does pest control last?
faqs.answer: It depends on the pest type and treatment method, but most treatments remain effective for 2–6 months. Recurring plans can provide longer protection.
